name: Zucchini and Mushroom Lasagna
description: Layers of zucchini and yellow squash with wild mushroom in a delicious marinara sauce

name: Chicken Parmigiano
description: Breaded chicken breast topped with basil, tomato and mozzarella cheese and a delicious marinara sauce, served with spaghetti squash

name: Braised Pork Ribs
description: Pork ribs braised to perfection and topped with bbq sauce, served with a loaded baked potato and corn on the cob
